body.name: Sweat X Sport Max Odor Defense Extreme Activewear Detergent
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 7 hrs 56 mins
features: SPECIALLY FORMULATED LAUNDRY DETERGENT soap for activewear and athletic workout apparel.
REMOVES AND ELIMINATES THE STINK including sweat stench, body odor and armpit funk from all fabrics.
PROTECTS AND RESTORES FABRIC PERFORMANCE including moisture-wicking, compression and breathability.
TACKLES YOUR TOUGHEST STAINS like mud, blood, grass, baseball clay, wine, pet and baby food stains.
SAFE FOR ALL FABRICS and all washing machines including HE; Non-toxic, Biodegradable and Skin Safe.
body.description: Take your laundry game to the Max! Sweat X Sport Max Odor Defense Laundry Detergent is designed to eliminate the foulest stench and the toughest stains so you are ready for your next workout. Sweat X is also cheaper per laundry load – all you need is one capful (1 ounce), and no dryer sheets or fabric softener is needed.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #24,005 in Health & Household (See Top 100 in Health & Household) #198 in Liquid Laundry Detergent

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great wash detergent for those of us who train every day! Leaves your athletic gear odorless and fresh for next training session!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have found the answer for getting a teenage boy’s white socks and baseball uniform white again. This product is amazing and it has a very pleasant fragrance. I highly recommend this MAX ODOR DEFENCE and you can use it on color clothes as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Smells great initially - wears off after a month of not wearing the shirt. Odor still somewhat there. Will perform another washing to see if improves.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Smelly Dog Beds!
reviews.reviewText: My husband bought this for his sports gear, but I found that it works great on smelly dog beds. My regular detergent is fine for normal smells, but my dog beds were coming out of the wash with an odor. This detergent cleans them well and has a nice smell that's not overpowering. I use one capful for a Great Dane bed and it's plenty. So glad we found this. I've been able to use the same dog beds for a few years now. I wash them every 2 weeks and they come out as good as new.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really gets the smell out!
reviews.reviewText: Son plays travel lacrosse, and after being in a car or hotel room with smelly gear - you know the value of getting the gear clean. This is super easy to use, I add to the detergent bin of the front loader with some regular detergent. Really works! Before I sometimes had to wash twice. This works great with single wash. Have used a few times and can tell the difference, smells much better!One mom on the team used some of this cleaner in a tub as a soak, she loved the results!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Doesn’t remove the funk
reviews.reviewText: I bought this specifically for my workout bras. Even after soaking my bras in borax , I’ll throw them in the wash with a capful of this product and it still doesn’t remove the funk. It doesn’t work any “better” than regular tide detergent . I won’t be purchasing again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This stuff is like magic. I gave up the GAIN EVERYTHING. THESE COMPANIES ARE NOW TRYING TO GET US TO BUY THEUR BEADS SO OUR CLOTHES SMELL BETTER LONGER??? Please. Regular laundry soap doesn’t work it traps the smells. No matter how much Downey softner or beads u use the smells are being trapped. I bought this thinking I watched my money. But I was so wrong. This stuff is amazing. Now I use it for all clothes. Not just the gym clothes. And guess what?? This stuff doesn’t tear up your washer like fabric softner does. Get this for all ur laundry. You will thank me when ur washer last 20 years. They don’t tell you the dirty little secrets of fabric softner and laundry detergents they all goop up on the inside of your washer parts and tears up your machines.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Seems to Work
reviews.reviewText: Two Grandsons are active and both work out at the gym. This has worked, so far, to take odors from their clothing in the wash.
